alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 30 at 5:55PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CHST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Central Guam. * WHEN...Until 800 PM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 553 PM ChST, Gauge reports indicated heavy rain due to heavy showers. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Central Guam is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Central Guam - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
